short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes GitHub issues and suggests possible fixes using an LLM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GitHub Issue AI Summarizer is a powerful Chrome extension that revolutionizes how you interact with GitHub issues. Using advanced AI technology, it automatically generates concise summaries of lengthy issue discussions, helping you quickly grasp the key points without scrolling through numerous comments. This tool is perfect for developers, project managers, and anyone who wants to stay on top of GitHub conversations efficiently. Save time, improve productivity, and never miss crucial information in your repositories again.

Key features: • AI-powered summarization of GitHub issues • Quick overview of long discussions • Time-saving tool for busy developers • Seamless integration with GitHub's interface • Customizable summary length and style

Streamline your GitHub workflow and enhance your project management with GitHub Issue AI Summarizer.
